name: Project:Warband
description:
this is intended to test game play features and overall scope of the game.

Controls

Press and hold  number keys 1-4 to select units to place  on broad

release to commit . 

Use Mouse Wheel to zoom camera 

Use WASD to move camera

Use mouse to move cursor 

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

 -keyboard and gamepad support 

-working factions : berdos and green party

please leave a comment on any feedback thanks
